lokeshpatil557@gmail.com.query: "What are high level points to consider in critical thinking?"
lokeshpatil557@gmail.com.response: High-level points to consider in critical thinking include gathering data, applying theoretical knowledge, communicating therapeutically, validating information, developing care plans, organizing clinical judgments, evaluating care effectiveness, and participating in critical thinking activities.

The Rehabilitation Treatment Specification System (RTSS) is a conceptual framework used to specify any rehabilitation treatment. It connects the actions of the clinician (ingredients) with the changes produced in the patient or other recipient of treatment. The RTSS encompasses treatment delivered to individual patients or caregivers, including modifications at home intended for one person. It is descriptive, not prescriptive, and seeks to specify all rehabilitation treatments to compare the effects of their ingredients on specific targets and evaluate their impact on different types of patients with similar target problems.

Volition is important because it represents the effort expended by the treatment recipient, and is required for treatments like physical exercise, skills and habits training, and representation-based treatments. Volition targets are important when clinicians cannot directly evaluate and modify the patient's performance, such as with medications taken on a schedule, home exercise programs, or homework assignments.

The COM-B framework, borrowed from Susan Michie and colleagues in Health Psychology, models voluntary behavior as a function of Capability, Opportunity, and Motivation. It is used to specify ingredients needed for voluntary behavior, especially behavior enacted at a remove from the clinician.
